ai-tika-s0401t15:1_0: “In this way, in the morning” is said in the name of the Council of taste, in the evening, and in the name of which he has actually made.
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_2: This is the cause, this is the reason for gets,
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_3: Whatever bad does not do, he does not do with one of evil wishes,
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_4: and it is rightly understood that this should be comprehended.
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_6: They get the states of definitionality, owing to the defining of these laws, and the others too should be seen in the way already stated.
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_7: Then taking the appearance of the Faith in the Dispensation of the Three Worlds, and the Elders arrival.
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_8: I have attained perfection the kind of peace.
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_12: “Abstinence in the word of the words “perfected” is the sweetness of the betemper .
ai-tika-s0401t15:1_13: Hence he is the reason why this is not applying the arising of gaining material possessions, honor, and popularity, as follows: this is the practice that leads to the cessation of gaining material possessions.
ai-tika-s0401t15:2_0: “Mendicants, if a mendicant might wish: receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick, let them fulfill their precepts.”
ai-tika-s0401t15:3_0: The Book of the Dhamma is finished.
